nodes.text: Todirium III was a location in the galaxy and the birthplace of the human pilot Lindon Javes. It was home to the Todirium militia, an organization which Javes served in.

Todirium III was mentioned in Star Wars canon in the 2020 video game Star Wars: Squadrons, where it is listed in Aurebesh on the datapad of Terisa Kerrill. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Todirium III was a planet in the Todirium system that appeared in the Aaron Allston novel X-Wing: Wraith Squadron.
